name: HERO'S HEAVEN
description:
HERO'S HEAVEN is a deck building game made for the 5th Extra Credits Game Jam.

As an newly deceased hero, you have been cast into your final trial. With only a journal by your side, you must collect cards and grow strong in order to face the one guarding the Passage to heaven. 

This game has took on these Extra Challanges: Extra Media and Extra Zoey.
